thirtyDayPolicy.title: 30-Day Return Policy
thirtyDayPolicy.description: You have 30 days from the date of purchase to return items in their original condition with tags attached.

returnConditions.title: Return Conditions
items: Items must be unworn, unwashed and in original packaging
All tags and labels must be attached
Items must be in saleable condition

howToReturn.title: How to Return
steps: Contact our customer service team to initiate a return
Package items securely with return form
Ship the package to our return address
After receipt we will process your return within 5-7 business days

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
refundProcess.description: Refunds will be processed to the original payment method. Please allow 5-7 business days for the refund to appear on your account.

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.description: If you have questions about delivery or returns, please don't hesitate to contact us.
